Name: Before the battery´s over
About the game: Coming soon / A puzzle game, which the objective is to restore all images with a finite amount of time and movements. At each completed stage, a new information about the narrative will be revealed. Discover a mysterious story behind this puzzle. With 21 levels with different images and increasing difficulty. Enjoy the grayscale cartooned illustrations while listening to an original soundtrack. Prologue Find out what it's like to be a robot, and deal with your internal problems. Restore a robot's memory files before its battery is over. A robot that is damaged, lost and with limited energy resources has the only chance to recover information that can save it. But a malicious program has fragmented the files on the disk. A manual restoration will be necessary, and for that, use the puzzle program to recover them. Features: Some resources and notes will assist in this task ... Each fragment can be exchanged two by two by clicking on the desired frames. For each repositioning of fragments there will be a fixed consumption of the battery. The 'Scanner' tool will assist in making the correctly positioned fragments. But be careful with the 'Scanner' resource, the more wrong positioned fragments, the higher the battery consumption.
